subject: Re: [junit] How to produce report in a web page
msgSnippet: ... The Ant (ant.apache.org) task  produces reports that look like Javadoc. That should be perfect for you. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar
messageBody:
g d wrote:
>
> hi,
>
> My Question is
> How to view the failure/error report produced by the JUnit TestRunner as
> a web page.

The Ant (ant.apache.org) task <junitreport> produces reports that look
like Javadoc. That should be perfect for you.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
